Highlighted Clause: 1. Your use of any of the otw sites is governed by that site's terms and policy.
Plain Language Summary: Remember that each website run by 'otw' has its own set of rules and privacy policies that you must follow.

Highlighted Clause: 2. In order for that content to be available to you, it also needs to be accessible to those on the archive team who have access to our servers, and to the board, policy & abuse.
Plain Language Summary: When you use their services, your content needs to be available not just to you but also to the team managing the service and to certain company authorities.

Highlighted Clause: 3. You understand that using the archive may expose you to material that is offensive, triggering, erroneous, sexually explicit, indecent, blasphemous, objectionable, grammatically incorrect, or badly spelled.
Plain Language Summary: Be aware that when using our service, you may encounter content that could be upsetting or inappropriate in various ways.

Highlighted Clause: 4. The otw expressly disclaims all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement.
Plain Language Summary: The company clearly states that it does not guarantee the quality, suitability for a specific purpose, or legal compliance of its service.

Highlighted Clause: 5. You agree that the otw shall not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of or limitation on your access to ao3.
Plain Language Summary: The company is not responsible if your access to their services is ended or restricted for any reason.

Highlighted Clause: 6. We may modify, suspend, or terminate your access to or use of our Services anytime for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider can change or end your access to their services at any time for any reason.

Highlighted Clause: 7. We do not own your content.
Plain Language Summary: The company does not claim ownership over the content you post using their services.

Highlighted Clause: 8. We will not sell, trade, or rent your personally identifying information.
Plain Language Summary: The company promises not to sell, exchange, or rent out your personal identifying information.

Highlighted Clause: 9. we may update the tos as necessary.
Plain Language Summary: The company reserves the right to make changes to the terms of service when they find it necessary.

Highlighted Clause: 10. If these terms of service and/or this privacy policy change at any point in the future, we will post the policy changes to the archive of our own.
Plain Language Summary: If there are any changes to the terms of service or privacy policy, the company will put those changes on their website.
